summary: An amnesic young woman is found fainting on a bench. A tattoo identifies her as Erica Olsen, ex-companion of a Chinese scientist who holds atomic secrets.
cast: Claudio Brook|Mireille Darc|Françoise Brion|Jean-Jacques Delbo|Edward G. Robinson|Giorgia Moll|Pascale Roberts|Yves Elliot|Carl Studer|Hellmut Lange|Werner Schwier|Anne-Marie Blanc|Mario Hindermann|Evelyne Greter|Valéry Inkijinoff|Tiny Yong|Mei Chen Chalais|Günter Lüdke|Joe Warfield|Philippe March|Guido Celano|Jean Francel|Jean Combal|Géo Valdy|Toan Le Minh|Roland Millet|Denise Perrier|Francis Lee|Claude Rossignol|Seymour
title: La rubia de Pekín
